definition: to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: When it comes to public speaking, there are three major avenues you can take to make good money.
sentences.chinese: 在演說者方面，有三種方法可以使你掙得盆滿鉢滿。

sentences.english: He sweats himself to earn as much money as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他拼命幹活以掙得儘可能多的錢。

sentences.english: He toiled all day long but earned very little.
sentences.chinese: 他整天勞碌但掙得很少。

sentences.english: I tried my best to get some points for Toyota.
sentences.chinese: 我竭盡全力想爲豐田車隊掙得一些分數。

sentences.english: They want them to earn more, and shop til they drop.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望中國人掙得更多，然後消費掉。

sentences.english: I can't go back to the village after an M.B.A. Delhi has more money, better quality of life.
sentences.chinese: 新德里生活條件更好，錢掙得也多。

sentences.english: Hawkwood made large sums of money in this way.
sentences.chinese: 霍克沃德用這種方法掙得大筆錢。

sentences.english: They actually don’t want Chinese laborers to earn less and spend little.
sentences.chinese: 他們實際上並不希望中國勞動者掙得少，花的少。

sentences.english: In fact, if you do this, you actually earn risk points.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這樣做也會掙得一些冒險分。

sentences.english: Today gang members barely into their teens can earn more money than their parents.
sentences.chinese: 現在，才十幾歲的幫派成員就能比他們父母掙得多。

sentences.english: Win them over to your side and you’re almost guaranteed to be earning more.
sentences.chinese: 把他們爭取到自己這邊，你就差不多保證能掙得更多。

sentences.english: However, you may keep for your own use all overtime income that you may earn.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，你所有掙得的加班費都由你自己支配。

sentences.english: Oh just calk me and I ll make your day .
sentences.chinese: 請打電話給我，我會掙得你幸運的一天。

sentences.english: Will you be required to recruit new distributors to earn your commission?
sentences.chinese: 你是否被要求要發展新的分享者來掙得你的報酬？

sentences.english: Hawkwood made large sums of money in this way.
sentences.chinese: 沃德用這種方法掙得大筆錢。
